New Records: Soto reached 100 RBIs for the third time in his career
Key Match Events: Soto fouled a pitch off his foot and continued to play
Soto hit a go-ahead two-run home run in the 11th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Boone praised Soto's performance and resilience
Soto expressed relief after hitting the home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees needed to overcome a late-inning deficit to win
Jazz Chisholm Jr. delivered the final blow with a walk-off hit
